author: Raisa Bruner
title: ‘You Should Not Be Able to Buy Justice.’ John Legend on the Dangers of Incarceration During Coronavirus
description: At the TIME 100 Talks virtual summit, John Legend performed two songs and discussed prioritizing criminal justice reform as COVID-19 spreads
content:
